about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Web Engineer with 5+ years experience building high-performance frontend architectures, AI-integrated workflows, and scalable e-commerce solutions using React, Node.js, and GraphQL.

responsibilities: Spearheaded the 'Do-It-For-Me' (DIFM) Restaurant Profiles project, implementing AI-powered and manual profile creation workflows that earned a production bonus and 2026 roadmap priority.
Engineered complex UI and API integrations for restaurant management, utilizing feature flags and redirection logic to ensure non-disruptive production deployments.
Developed a high-impact 'Chrome' shared component for in-product support, widely adopted across multiple repositories to maintain UI consistency and enhance user assistance.
Contributed to the technical strategy and ideation of the 'Unlimited Google Covers' add-on, a strategic initiative designed to reduce customer churn and provide flat-rate value.
Led frontend development for Uniqloâ€™s global e-commerce app using React.JS and GraphQL, ensuring high performance for over 60M active users.
Optimized a complex BFF application via Node.js and Express, streamlining communication with 20+ microservices for enhanced system scalability.
Architected a robust country configuration system, enabling seamless global scaling and localization across multiple international regions and sub-brands.
Implemented Google Wallet with 3DS support across 26 countries, driving a 10% boost in conversion rates by streamlining payment checkout flows.
Utilized Firebase Remote Config for A/B testing on cart recommendations, significantly improving CTA engagement and successfully productionalizing winning variants.
Built a high-performance PWA Email Newsletter Builder from scratch using React and PostgreSQL, empowering marketing teams with drag-and-drop template creation.
Developed a viral referral feature for Uniqlo US/Japan, contributing to a substantial customer base growth of 0.8 million users.
Engineered a React/GraphQL Proof of Concept to document API calls and error cases between SPA and microservices for improved clarity.
Mentored junior engineers on modern frontend practices and Uniqlo's platform architecture to ensure consistent knowledge sharing and onboarding.
